    • Method Detail

      • isWord

        public static boolean isWord(java.lang.String text,
                             java.lang.String word,
                             int pos)
        Returns if the specified word is a word.

        A word is considered as such if it does not adjoin to a letter or a digit at the left and/or right end.

        Parameters:
        text - the text which the word is part of
        word - the word that may be a word
        pos - the position which the word starts at within the text
        Returns:
        if the word does not adjoin to a letter or a digit

      • isWordStart

                                int pos)

      • wordLength

        public static int wordLength(java.lang.String in)
        Returns the length of a word which is defined as the first position where the character is not a digit or letter
        Parameters:
        in - the String in which a word end is searched
        Returns:
        the length of a word which is defined as the first position where the character is not a digit or letter

      • indLastBlockStart

        public static int indLastBlockStart(java.lang.String in,
                                    int pos,
                                    java.lang.String blockStart,
                                    java.lang.String blockEnd)
        Returns the position of the last block start where block is a portion of text that is bordered by a block start and a block end signal.

        Parameters:
        in - the text
        pos - the position relative to which the last block start is searched
        blockStart - the String that signals the start of a block
        blockEnd - the String that signals the end of a block
        Returns:
        the position of the last block start or -1 if no block start is found or the block end is closer than block start

      • indNextBlockEnd

        public static int indNextBlockEnd(java.lang.String in,
                                  int pos,
                                  java.lang.String blockStart,
                                  java.lang.String blockEnd)
        Returns the position of the next block end where block is a portion of text that is bordered by a block start and a block end signal.

        Parameters:
        in - the text
        pos - the position relative to which the next block end is searched
        blockStart - the String that signals the start of a block
        blockEnd - the String that signals the end of a block
        Returns:
        the position of the next block end or -1 if the next block start is closer than the block end

      • isInQuotes

        public static boolean isInQuotes(java.lang.String in,
                                 int pos,
                                 int length)
        Returns if a portion of text is in double quotes
        Parameters:
        in - the text
        pos - the start position of the portion that may be in quotes
        length - the length of the portion that may be in quotes
        Returns:
        if the portion of text starting at pos and given length is in double quotes
